name: Boric Stoneshaper
title: The Arcane Architect

features.title: Arcane Ward
features.desc: When you cast an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, you can simultaneously use a strand of the spell's magic to create a magical ward on yourself that lasts until you finish a long rest. The ward has hit points equal to twice your wizard level + your Intelligence modifier. When you take damage, the ward takes the damage instead.

features.title: Arcane Recovery
features.desc: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level that is equal to or less than half your wizard level (rounded up).

features.title: Dwarven Resilience
features.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

equipment: A quarterstaff, a spellbook, a scholar's pack, a letter from a dead colleague, and a pouch with 10 gp.

personality.traits: I am horribly, horribly awkward in social situations. I use polysyllabic words that convey the impression of great erudition.
personality.ideal: Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge.
personality.bond: I've been searching my whole life for the answer to a certain question.
personality.flaw: I am easily distracted by the promise of information.

spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.desc: Ranged spell attack deals 1d10 fire damage.

spells.name: Light
spells.desc: Make an object shed bright light in a 20-foot radius.

spells.name: Mage Hand
spells.desc: Create a spectral, floating hand that can manipulate objects.

spells.name: Shield
spells.desc: As a reaction, gain +5 to AC until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.desc: Create three magical darts that each deal 1d4+1 force damage.

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.desc: For 10 minutes, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet.

spells.name: Feather Fall
spells.desc: Up to five falling creatures' rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round.

spells.name: Misty Step
spells.desc: As a bonus action, teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

spells.name: Web
spells.desc: Create a 20-foot cube of sticky webs, making the area difficult terrain and potentially restraining creatures.
